caller_intent: Derek is following up on an unresolved document issue from a previous interaction, requesting resolution to process invoices and ensure compliance with the vendor's requirements.
resolution_steps: Rick acknowledges the issue with the document not being processed despite the vendor uploading a link.
Rick commits to forwarding the issue to his support team to investigate the compliance problem.
Rick agrees to contact the vendor to clarify the specific compliance issue and resolve it.
Rick provides his personal number to Derek for updates and arranges for his team to text Derek once the issue is resolved.
knowledge_required: Document compliance requirements for insurance renewals
summary: Derek reports an unresolved document compliance issue preventing invoice processing. Rick confirms the vendor uploaded a link but the document remains non-compliant. He promises to escalate to support, contact the vendor for clarification, and notify Derek via text once resolved. Derek provides his number for follow-up.
